entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump Watching/listening 2 U/them lie about Coronavirus is even worse than praising Nazis, 
disrespecting Gold Star families, or kids in cages. Makes me certain U/they will do 
something "tomorrow" that is even worse! 

"Deplorable," now, seems like such a tiny & horribly lacking word. https://t.co/z5vbwsVmGx
